attributes.action: increase the amount of EMA from £30 to £40 a week and increase the age to 19.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bus fares, train fares and even stationary shop items are going up. We students cannot pay for everything with £30 a week.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
